meanings.definition: The act of restoring something to its original condition.
meanings.sent1: The restorations of the old painting brought out its true beauty.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed various restorations of ancient artifacts.
meanings.sent3: The restorations of the vintage car made it look brand new.
meanings.sent4: Her restorations of the antique furniture were like magic.
meanings.sent5: The restorations of the historic building were a labor of love.

meanings.definition: The process of repairing or renovating something.
meanings.sent1: The careful restorations of the house took months to complete.
meanings.sent2: Restorations of the damaged bridge were necessary after the storm.
meanings.sent3: The restorations of the broken toy were a team effort.
meanings.sent4: Restorations of the old clock required delicate precision.
meanings.sent5: The restorations of the classic car were a true work of art.

meanings.definition: The result of bringing something back to its former state.
meanings.sent1: The restorations of the garden made it bloom with color again.
meanings.sent2: Restorations of the historic site attracted many visitors.
meanings.sent3: The restorations of the recipe made it taste even better.
meanings.sent4: Her restorations of the old photographs brought back memories.
meanings.sent5: The restorations of the forest brought back its natural beauty.
